mapper.sql: p.post_id as id, p.category_id, p.board_type_id, p.title, p.content, p.view_count, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.is_deleted as deleted, p.is_locked as locked, p.is_fixed as fixed, p.member_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( category_id, board_type_id, title, content, view_count, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted, is_locked, is_fixed, member_id ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{boardTypeId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, NOW(), NOW(), false, #{locked}, #{fixed}, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW(), is_locked = #{locked} WHERE post_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.select: SELECT , m.nickname, c.name as category_name FROM posts p LEFT JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.post_id = #{id} AND p.is_deleted = false

SELECT DISTINCT , m.nickname, c.name as categoryName, /* 파일 정보 */ f.file_id as "files.id", f.original_name as "files.originalName", f.saved_name as "files.savedName", f.saved_path as "files.savedPath", f.file_size as "files.fileSize", f.content_type as "files.contentType", f.created_at as "files.createdAt", /* 댓글 정보 */ cm.comment_id as "comments.id", cm.content as "comments.content", cm.member_id as "comments.memberId", cm.created_at as "comments.createdAt", cm.is_deleted as "comments.deleted", cm_m.nickname as "comments.nickname" FROM posts p LEFT JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN files f ON p.post_id = f.post_id LEFT JOIN comments cm ON p.post_id = cm.post_id AND cm.is_deleted = false LEFT JOIN members cm_m ON cm.member_id = cm_m.member_id WHERE p.post_id = #{id} AND p.is_deleted = false ORDER BY f.file_id, cm.created_at DESC

SELECT , m.nickname, c.name as category_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM files f WHERE f.post_id = p.post_id) as file_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments cm WHERE cm.post_id = p.post_id) as comment_count, (SELECT CONCAT(t.saved_path, '/', t.saved_name) FROM thumbnail t WHERE t.post_id = p.post_id LIMIT 1) as thumbnail_url FROM posts p LEFT JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id
LIMIT #{search.offset}, #{search.size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts p LEFT JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.member_id
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
UPDATE posts SET is_deleted = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM posts WHERE post_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false )
